Html:
Hi, 

on page 17 of the documentation it says that to apply an autofilter this is the code:

$objPHPExcel->getActiveSheet()->setAutoFilter('A1:C9');

When i try it, on excel, i can see the header cells with the autofilter (the boxes with the black triangle), but how can I trigger the autofilter to be something in particular, as in, how to order a column in alphabetically?

thanks
There is no option in PHPExcel to activate the filtering or sorting or autofilter columns, merely to enable autofilter for a block of cells.
